Parental Consent Form: Required for ALL Users Under Age 13
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Office Of The Mayor: Read This Section First!: Privacy Policy Read If You Are Under 13, Or A Parent!: Parental Consent Form: Required for ALL Users Under Age 13
Please, read the following document carefully.
If, as the parent or guardian of someone under 13, you wish to permit them access to this board, print two copies of the following document. Keep one for your records. Take one to a notary, sign and date the other copy in the presence of the notary, have the notary sign and seal the document, and mail it to the address shown on the form. Anyone under 13 will be denied access to the board until a signed copy is recieved.
Once a consent form has been received, a virtual copy will be posted here, under Completed Consent Forms. Once the form is up, the child may apply via email for a message board account.
-Lisa Shock, monster_rancher_metropolis@hotmail.com
By Lisa Shock on Friday, March 29, 2002 - 10:30 am:

By my signature below, I give my consent for my child, ________________, to post at your site, Monster Rancher Metropolis. I understand that my child may choose to post an e-mail address as part of his/her personal registration at the site and that email address will be publicly visible. However, I also understand that the e-mail address, the screen name, and anything my child posts will only be used for internal website purposes and will not be sold or otherwise provided to any other business or entity.

By my signature below, I acknowledge having reviewed your site, and approve it as a place my child may visit. I understand that both adults and children post at this site, and that it is not a "children's only" site. I understand that video and computer games are discussed freely on the site, and I take the responsibility for reviewing for myself the nature of all such games, and whether each particular game is suitable for my child. I also acknowledge and understand that the game manufacturers and designers are responsible for the contents of the games discussed at the site.

By my signature below, I acknowledge that the chat room which is part of this site is off limits for my child.

I understand that a copy of this form with my electronic signature will be posted on the site. I understand that I can revoke or amend my consent at any time by posting the revocation or amendment in the assigned message area under the consent form on the website.

I understand that my child will not be permitted to participate in the site until a mailed copy of the consent form with a signature of a parent or guardian is received by the administrator of the site at the following address:
Lisa Shock
PMB 106
4757 E. Greenway Road 107B
Phoenix, AZ 85032-8510
